Verses: 1 yobu Pradhiyuththaramaaga:
2 en Vasanaththai Gavanamaaik Kelungal; Idhu Neengal Ennaith Thetraravupannuvadhupola Irukkum.
3 naan Pesappogiren, Sagiththirungal; Naan Pesinapinbu Pariyaasampannungal.
4 naan Manushanaippaarththaa Angalaaikkiren? Appadiyaanaalum En Aavi Visanappadaadhirukkumaa?
5 ennai Gavaniththuppaarungal, Appozhudhu Neengal Bramiththu, Ungal Vaayaik Kaiyaal Poththikkolveergal.
6 idhai Naan Ninaikkaiyil Kalangugiren; Nadukkam En Maamsaththaip Pidikkum.
7 dhunmaarkkar Jeeviththu Viruththaraagi, Vallavaraavaanen?
8 avargalodunkooda Avargal Sandhadhiyaar Avargalukku Munbaagavum, Avargal Pillaigal Avargal Kangalukku Munbaagavum Thidappadugiraargal.
9 avargal Veedugal Bayamillaamal Baththirappattirukkum; Dhevanudaiya Milaaru Avargalmel Varugiradhillai.
10 avargaludaiya Erudhu Polindhaal, Veenaaippogaadhu; Avargaludaiya Pasu Sinai Azhiyaamal Eenugiradhu.
11 avargal Thangal Kuzhandhaigalai Oru Mandhaiyaippola Veliye Pogavidugiraargal; Avargal Pillaigal Kudhiththu Vilaiyaadugiraargal.
12 avargal Thamburaiyum Suramandalaththaiyum Eduththup Paadi, Kinnaraththin Osaikku Sandhoshappadugiraargal.
13 avargal Selvavaangalaaith Thangal Naatkalaip Pokki, Oru Kshanappozhudhile Paadhaalaththil Irangugiraargal.
14 avargal Dhevanai Nokki: Engalaivittu Vilagiyirum, Ummudaiya Vazhigalai Ariya Virumbom;
15 sarvavallavarai Naam Sevikka Avar Yaar? Avarai Nokki Jebampannuvadhinaal Namakkup Prayojanam Enna Engiraargal.
16 aanaalum Avargal Vaazhvu Avargal Kaiyiliraadhu; Dhunmaarkkarin Aalosanai Enakku Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga.
17 eththanai Sadudhiyil Dhunmaarkkarin Vilakku Anaindhupom; Avar Thamadhu Kobaththinaal Vedhanaigalaip Pagirndhukodukkaiyil, Avargal Aabaththu Avargalmel Varum.
18 avargal Kaatrumugaththilirukkira Thurumbaippolavum, Perungaatru Parakkadikkira Padharaippolavum Irukkiraargal.
19 dhevan Avanudaiya Akkiramaththai Avan Pillaigalukku Vaiththu Vaikkiraar; Avan Unaraththakkavidhamaai Adhai Avanukkup Palikkappannugiraar.
20 avanudaiya Azhivai Avanudaiya Kangal Kaanum, Sarvavallavarudaiya Ukkiraththaik Kudippaan.
21 avan Maadhangalin Thogai Kurukkappadumpodhu, Avanukkup Pirpaadu Avan Veettaippatri Avanukku Irukkum Viruppamenna?
22 uyarndhorai Nyaayantheerkkira Dhevanukku Arivai Unarththa Yaaraalaagum?
23 oruvan Nirvaagaththodum Sugaththodum Vaazhndhu Kuraiyatra Belanullavanaai Saagiraan.
24 avanudaiya Paalpaaththirangal Paalaal Nirambiyirukkiradhu, Avan Elumbugalil Oon Pushtiyaayirukkiradhu.
25 veroruvan Oru Naalaavadhu Sandhoshaththode Saappidaamal, Manakkilesaththode Saagiraan.
26 iruvarum Samamaai Mannile Paduththukkollugiraargal; Puzhukkal Avargalai Moodum.
27 idho, Naan Ungal Ninaivugalaiyum, Neengal Ennaippatri Aniyaayamaaik Kondirukkum Aalosanaigalaiyum Ariven.
28 prabuvinudaiya Veedu Enge? Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Koodaaram Enge? Endru Sollugireergal.
29 vazhinadandhupogiravargalai Neengal Ketkavillaiyaa? Avargal Sollum Kurippugalai Neengal Ariyavillaiyaa?
30 dhunmaarkkan Aabaththunaalukkendru Vaikkappadugiraan; Avan Kobaakkinaiyin Naalukkendru Konduvarappadugiraan.
31 avan Vazhiyai Avan Mugaththukku Munbaagath Thoondik Kaanbikkiravan Yaar? Avan Seygaikkuththakka Palanai Avanukku Sarikkattugiravan Yaar?
32 avan Kallaraikkuk Konduvarappadugiraan; Avan Kori Kaakkappattirukkum.
33 pallaththaakkin Pulpaththaigal Avanukku Inbamaayirukkum; Avanukku Munnaaga Ennirandha Janangal Ponadhupola, Avanukkup Pinnaaga Ovvoruvarum Avvidaththukku Selluvaargal.
34 neengal Veenaana Aarudhalai Enakku Sollugiradhu Enna? Ungal Marumozhigalil Unmaikkedu Irukkiradhu Endraan.
